level.text: The contracting officer may conduct a pre-proposal conference to brief prospective offerors after a solicitation has been issued but before offers are submitted.
The contracting officer or designated representative shall:
Furnish all prospective offerors identical information concerning the proposed procurement;
Make a complete record of the conference; and
Promptly publish a copy of that record to all prospective offerors.
The contracting officer shall inform all pre-proposal conference attendees that:
Remarks and explanations at the conference do not qualify or amend the terms of the solicitation; and
Nothing stated at the pre-proposal conference shall change an RFP unless a change is made by the contracting officer by written amendment.
